setting.world_map.fast_mapping.tooltip: Increases mapping speed, might hurt FPS. Adjust rate limit and delay to regain FPS.
setting.world_map.fast_mapping_delay.too:
Fast Mapping must be enabled. 
 This is roughly the delay in milliseconds between minimap update operations, both render and actual file writes.
setting.world_map.fast_mapping_rate_limi:
Fast Mapping must be enabled. 
 Limits how many chunks can be written in a single cycle. Lower values improve FPS at high render distances.
setting.world_map.fast_zip_writes.toolti: Writes Map tile zip files faster but uses more RAM. Disable this if you have low RAM available
setting.world_map.baritone_waypoint.tool: Syncs Baritone goals as temporary waypoints.
setting.world_map.disable_waypoint_shari: Disables waypoint sharing with other players.
setting.world_map.disable_receiving_wayp: Disables receiving waypoints from other players.
setting.world_map.waypoint_receive_no_ch: Waypoint Receive No Chat Reports Fix
Fixes parsing the player sending waypoints in chat on servers with the NoChatReports plugin installed
setting.world_map.persist_dimension_swit: If enabled, the dimension will not be switched back to current when the WorldMap GUI is closed.
setting.world_map.radar_while_dimension_: Disables WorldMap radar rendering while dimension switched
setting.world_map.transparent_obsidian_r: Makes obsidian placed at build height transparent. Does not update tiles already mapped - you need to remap them.
Sets the min Y level of the transparent obsidian roof.
Sets the opacity of the transparent obsidian roof tiles.
Sets the opacity of snow on top of the obsidian roof.
setting.world_map.min_zoom.tooltip: Minimum WorldMap Zoom Setting. This is 10x what you see on the WorldMap.
setting.world_map.skip_world_render.tool: Skip MC world render while in a Xaero GUI. Having this on can cause issues with travel mods while you're in a Xaero GUI like the WorldMap.
setting.world_map.new_chunks_highlightin: Highlights NewChunks on the Minimap and WorldMap.
setting.world_map.old_chunks_inverse.too: Highlights chunks that were generated in 1.13 or higher. The opposite of OldChunks.
setting.world_map.new_chunks_save_load_t: Saves and loads NewChunk data to disk for each world and dimension. Requires NewChunk Highlighting to be enabled.
setting.world_map.new_chunks_opacity.too: Changes the color opacity of NewChunks.
setting.world_map.old_chunks_highlightin: Highlights OldChunks on the Minimap and WorldMap. An OldChunk is a chunk that was generated in 1.12.2 or lower based on the blocks present in the chunk. Intended for use on 2b2t
setting.world_map.old_chunks_save_load_t: Saves and loads OldChunk data to disk for each world and dimension. Requires OldChunk Highlighting to be enabled.
setting.world_map.old_chunks_opacity.too: Changes the color opacity of OldChunks.
setting.world_map.portals.tooltip: Highlights chunks where Nether Portals and End Portals are found
setting.world_map.portals_save_load_to_d: Saves and loads Portals data to disk for each world and dimension. Requires Portal Highlights to be enabled
setting.world_map.portals_opacity.toolti: Changes the color opacity of Portal Highlights.
setting.world_map.portals_color.tooltip: Changes the color of Portal highlights.
Highlights chunks where portals could have been loaded into. 
 This is useful for basehunting to detect where players could switch dimensions along a trail to avoid hunters. 
 One thing to note: 2b2t's view distance is not large enough to detect portal skip areas. You need to load surrounding chunks - specifically a 15x15 chunk area
setting.world_map.portal_skip_opacity.to: Changes the color opacity of Portal Skip Detection.
setting.world_map.portal_skip_color.tool: Changes the color of Portal Skip Detection.
setting.world_map.portal_skip_search_del:
Portal Skip Detection must be enabled. 
 This is the delay in ticks between Portal Skip Detection search operations.
setting.world_map.portal_skip_portal_rad: The chunk radius the server loads immediately around a portal exit during a teleport.
setting.world_map.portal_skip_new_chunks:
Uses NewChunks to determine if a chunk was not loaded before. Therefore a portal could not have been created in its radius. 
 Requires NewChunks to be enabled.
setting.world_map.portal_skip_old_chunks:
Uses OldChunks Inverse to determine if a chunk was not loaded before. Therefore a portal could not have been created in its radius. 
 Requires OldChunks inverse to be enabled.
setting.world_map.wdl_highlight.tooltip: Highlights chunks WDL mod has downloaded on the Minimap and WorldMap.
setting.world_map.wdl_opacity.tooltip: Changes the color opacity of WDL chunks.
setting.world_map.wdl_color.tooltip: Changes the color of WDL chunks.
setting.world_map.ow_auto_waypoint_dimen: Prefer creating and viewing Overworld waypoints when in the nether.
setting.world_map.show_waypoint_distance: Display the distance to every waypoint in the full waypoint menu.
setting.world_map.show_render_distance.t: Show server side render distance (actually just another setting)
setting.world_map.show_render_distance_w: Show server side render distance on the WorldMap
setting.world_map.null_overworld_dimensi:
Sets whether the overworld WorldMap directory is in DIM0 or null (default) 
 MC must be restarted for changes to take effect.
setting.world_map.data_folder_resolution:
Sets how the WorldMap and Waypoints data folders are resolved. 
 MC must be restarted for changes to take effect. 
 IP = Server IP (Xaero Default). Example: .minecraft/XaeroWorldMap/Multiplayer_connect.2b2t.org 
 SERVER_NAME = MC Server Entry Name. Example: .minecraft/XaeroWorldMap/Multiplayer_2b2t 
 BASE_DOMAIN = Base Server Domain Name. Example: .minecraft/XaeroWorldMap/Multiplayer_2b2t.org
setting.minimap.transparent_background.t: Makes the minimap background transparent instead of black.
setting.minimap.minimap_scaling.tooltip: Increases the base minimap scale beyond the default size.
setting.world_map.nether_cave_fix.toolti:
Forces full cave maps to be written and rendered when cave mode is off in the nether. 
 Without this, you have to manually move region files pre WorldMap 1.30.0 to the correct cave folder
setting.minimap.always_render_player_nam: Always render player name on the radar.
setting.minimap.always_render_player_ico: Always render player icon on the radar.
setting.minimap.fix_main_entity_dot.tool: Fixes the main entity dot rendering on the radar when arrow is rendered.
setting.waypoints.waypoint_beacon_scale_:
Sets the minimum scale of the waypoint beacon when it is far away. 
 This value is the number of chunks away from the player the beacon is rendered at. 
 0 = auto-match the player's render distance
setting.waypoints.waypoint_beacon_distan: Sets the minimum xz distance from the player the waypoint must be to render a beacon.
gui.xaeroplus.check_github_button: Go to XaeroPlus Github for updates
setting.world_map.waystone_color.tooltip: Uses an optional preset color for all waystone waypoints or a random color.
Creates a separate waypoint set for waystone waypoints instead of adding them to the default set.
